Articles.Content:
Do you like shouting random words into the sky? well do we have the word for you. The D.L.A.S.C or Duna Low Altitude Surveillance Copter is the pinnacle of word, and helicopter science. So next time you're going to stap yourself to giant high speed spinning blades, think D.L.A.S.C.

D.L.A.S.C. is the ultimate form of Duna exploration. equipped with ten whole minutes worth of electric charge, room for three pieces of science equipment, and two kerbals, D.L.A.S.C. offers excellent coverage for all your outpost needs. tired of hitting bups and tipping your rover, no more as D.L.A.S.C.just goes over them, how simple? who new roving could be so innovative?

Images in the spoiler

 

Facts:

63 parts

10 minutes of charge

service ceiling of 4000 tested, might go higher

can drive as a rover

 

Controls:

throttle is H and N

folding is not assigned to action group simple clock on the controller to fold and unfold it.

 

Download at:

https://kerbalx.com/penguinhero/DLASC

or

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1760503771

catch a clip of it on reddit at

https://old.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/bwdor3/a_duna_capable_collapsing_dual_rotor_helicopter/

 

Enjoy

 

 

Edited June 4, 2019 by Penguinhero
